name: Connected (Herof123, Ratainen)
description:
MADE FOR BRACKEYS JAM 2022.2

In this game you control 2 players, connect and switch between them to progress through levels.

CONTROLS:

ALONE:

WASD OR ARROWS TO MOVE

Z, SPACE, UP OR W TO JUMP

C OR LEFT SHIFTH TO SWITCH

LEFT CLICK, X, O, E TO CONNECT / DECONNECT

ESC TO PAUSE

LOCAL CO-OP:

PLAYER 1:

WASD TO MOVE

W, Z OR SPACE TO JUMP

E TO CONNECT / DECONNECT

PLAYER 2:

JKLI OR ARROWS TO MOVE

I TO MOVE

O TO CONNECT / DECONNECT

ESC TO PAUSE
